thread.title: This Shaved Ice Will Convince You to Book a Disney Vacation in Hawaii
thread.title_full: This Shaved Ice Will Convince You to Book a Disney Vacation in Hawaii

author: Brinton Parker
title: This Shaved Ice Will Convince You to Book a Disney Vacation in Hawaii
text:
Mickey Mouse Shaved Ice at Disney Aulani This Shaved Ice Will Convince You to Book a Disney Vacation in Hawaii March 10, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 This Shaved Ice Will Convince You to Book a Disney Vacation in Hawaii 
A trip to Hawaii wouldn't be complete without shaved ice, and a Disney vacation simply isn't whole without Mickey Mouse. So when you take a Disney vacation in Hawaii, simply combine the two! At Disney's Aulani Hawaii resort , visitors can't stop raving about (and Instagramming) their Mickey-shaped shaved ice desserts. Complete with the iconic round ears and available in a variety of flavors, the photos might just convince you to book a flight to Hawaii ASAP. Keep scrolling and you'll see what we mean! Related:
